mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(article_id, user_id, content, created_date, last_modified_date) VALUES (#{comment.articleId}, #{comment.userId}, #{comment.content}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT comment.*, users.nickname AS user_nickname, users.profile_image AS profile_image, users.tier AS tier, (comment_likes.user_id IS NOT NULL) AS is_liked, IFNULL(likes_counts.count, 0) AS like_count FROM comment LEFT JOIN users ON comment.user_id = users.id LEFT JOIN comment_likes ON comment.id = comment_likes.comment_id AND comment_likes.user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN (SELECT comment_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM comment_likes GROUP BY comment_id) AS likes_counts ON comment.id = likes_counts.comment_id WHERE comment.id = #{id}

SELECT comment.*, users.nickname AS user_nickname, users.profile_image AS user_profile_image, users.tier AS user_tier, (comment_likes.user_id IS NOT NULL) AS is_liked, IFNULL(likes_counts.count, 0) AS like_count FROM comment LEFT JOIN users ON comment.user_id = users.id LEFT JOIN comment_likes ON comment.id = comment_likes.comment_id AND comment_likes.user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN (SELECT comment_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM comment_likes GROUP BY comment_id) AS likes_counts ON comment.id = likes_counts.comment_id WHERE article_id = #{articleId} AND comment.id < #{pageable.lastIndex} ORDER BY like_count DESC, comment.id DESC LIMIT #{pageable.size};
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET content = #{comment.content}, last_modified_date = now() WHERE id = #{comment.id}
